SnowmanEnterDuration.Description: Time for a survivor to enter the snowman

SnowmanMovementSpeed.Description: The percentage speed modifier given to players controlling snowmen

SnowmanMaxRespawnsAfterKillerAttackWhile.Description: The maximum number of times a snowman is allowed to respawn after being destroyed by the killer while occupied (use -1 if infinite respawns are desired)

SnowmanDestructionTime.Description: The time it takes to destroy the snowman

SnowmanAttachToPlayerDelay.Description: Delay before snowman mesh is attached to player's mesh, accounts for latency

SnowmanHighFiveVFXCooldown.Description: How long after two snowmen high five before the high five vfx is able to be triggered again

SnowmanMinimumTimeToRunAndExit.Description: How long it initially takes before being able to run out the snowman. Serves as a buffer so we don't run out right away after use.

SnowmanCameraZoomBack.Description: How far the camera should zoom back when controlling a snowman

SnowmanTimeToZoomEnter.Description: How long it takes for the camera to zoom back when getting into a snowman

SnowmanTimeToZoomExit.Description: How long it takes for the camera to zoom back in when getting out of a snowman

InitialNumberOfSnowmen.Description: The initial amount of snowmen to spawn in the game when the match starts

MinimumSpawnDistanceFromOtherPlayers.Description: The minimum distance from any player it takes for a spawn point to be considered legal

MinimumSpawnDistanceFromOtherSnowmen.Description: The minimum distance from any active snowman it takes for a spawn point to be considered legal

NavmeshRadiusDistance.Description: Radius used from origin locations to find navmesh locations near it.

NavmeshMinimumDistanceFromOriginLocation.Description: The minimum distance a navmesh spawn point requires to be from its origin spawn location

MinDistanceFromPallet.Description: The minimum distance a snowman can spawn from any pallet that has been spawned in game.

MinDistanceFromHatch.Description: The minimum distance a snowman can spawn from the hatch that has been spawned in game.

NavmeshCollisionCheckXExtent.Description: The X value for the box extend used to check collision for navmesh spawn point location found.

NavmeshCollisionCheckYExtent.Description: The Y value for the box extend used to check collision for navmesh spawn point location found.

NavmeshCollisionCheckZExtent.Description: The Z value for the box extend used to check collision for navmesh spawn point location found.

SnowmanKillerEnterDuration.Description: Time for a killer to enter the snowman

SnowmanMinimumTimeToAttackAndExit.Description: How long it initially takes before being able to attack out the snowman. Serves as a buffer so you can't attack straight away

RotationScaleAdjustmentTime.Description: Time it will take to adjust the rotation scale

MaxTrackedTimeSinceSnowmanExit.Description: How long killer can be outside of a snowman before hitting a survivor to qualify for the Suprise Hit scoring event
